key.name: all-panels
key.summary: Whether to apply effects to all panels
key.description: Whether to apply effects to all panels (true) or only to the panel containing the applet (false).

key.name: active-effect
key.summary: The type of effect to apply to panels
key.description: The type of effect (e.g. blur, pixellate) to apply to panels.

key.name: pixellate-setting
key.summary: The amount of pixellation to apply to panel backgrounds
key.description: The amount of pixellation to be applied to panel backgrounds

key.name: blur-setting
key.summary: The amount of blur to apply to panel backgrounds
key.description: The amount of blur to be applied to panel backgrounds

key.name: smear-setting
key.summary: The amount of pixel spread to apply to panel backgrounds
key.description: The amount of pixel spread to be applied to panel backgrounds

key.name: panel-colour
key.summary: The background colour to apply to panels
key.description: The background color in hex RGB format e.g. "#ffffff"

key.name: panel-alpha
key.summary: The alpha (transparency) value to apply to panel colours
key.description: The alpga (transparency) value (between 0 and 1) to apply to panel colours
